name: netsil
description: Netsil is the monitoring and analytics product for API and microservices driven applications. Auto-discovered topology map of your services enables you to find and fix failures fast. Listen to your APIs, see your apps.
preInstallNotes: We recommend using 4 CPUs and 4 GB of memory for Netsil. You will also need to install the netsil-collectors package, which feeds network and infrastructure data to Netsil for monitoring.
postInstallNotes: Netsil is installed! Go to https://<your_dcos_url>/service/netsil to access Netsil.
